name: Mutant Massacre (Early Access)
description:
100% FREE DOWNLOAD

HAS 4 DIFFERENT ENDINGS

Controls 

Move: Arrow Keys

Shoot: Left Click Mouse

Change Camera: Right Click Mouse

Reset Stats: R Button

Hit Switch: S Button

Leave Building: L button

Start Game: A

Dr. Sumac is an evil genius who is responsible for many biological wars. He was once an ally you the military. But he has gone rogue and vows to rule the world by enslaving it. Starting with his ex comrades.

You are Sgt. Jane a skilled bomb specialist and medic. Your task is to collect 5 different mutant serum containers and assassinate Dr. Sumac and his mutant army. He also has a side kick, The Mutant Pyromancer. But you are not alone you will be assisted by you teammates. Private Penny, Major Mariam and General Brick to name a few. Find the serum containers and get to the extraction point to win the game. The ending will change depending on the amount and type of serum you collect.
